message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice, but inflation is eating our money! Let's be reasonable and close the deal.
Come on Bob, don't let inflation get the best of you! 58-42 is a good compromise.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and end this before inflation eats all the profit!
I know inflation is biting, but I'm not going below 570k. Last chance, Bob!
